data.md:MetaData: Age determination of sediment core RIA3P, Riabelais, France
Peaty palaeo-channel of Choisille river. Physiography: terrace of Choisille in alluvial plain. Surrounding vegetation: cultivated fields. Device: Eijkelkamp FB60 corer
Etude palynologique du site de Riabelais (vallée de la Choisille) (Fondettes et Saint-Cyr)
